overview: The Gingerweed Man runs a successful dispensary delivery service, catering to a wide array of wacky clientele. But when he gets charged with protecting little Baby Buddy, a mysterious super strain weed dude that is wanted by every bad vibe in the city, mad misadventures follow. A riotous new comedy adventure offshoot from Full Moon's hugely popular EVIL BONG franchise.
title: The Gingerweed Man
